mapper.select: SELECT login_id loginId , manager_name managerName , manager_birth managerBirth , manager_gender managerGender , address , detail_addr detailAddr , manager_email managerEmail , manager_phone managerPhone , d.dept_name deptName , position_name positionName , m.create_date createDate FROM manager m INNER JOIN position p ON p.position_no = m.position_no INNER JOIN dept d ON d.dept_no = m.dept_no WHERE login_id = #{loginId}

SELECT m.login_id loginId , m.manager_name managerName , m.position_no positionNo , p.position_name positionName , m.create_date createDate FROM manager m JOIN position p ON m.position_no = p.position_no
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM login WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND login_pw = PASSWORD(#{loginPw})
SELECT dept_no deptNo , dept_name deptName FROM dept
SELECT position_no positionNo , position_name positionName FROM position
